EmailTemplate.description: This email is using in survey
EmailTemplate.name: SHP CSAT Survey Email to SCN Employer Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Did we meet your expectations?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Employer_Group_Data__c.HREmployer_Portal_Name1__c},
Thank you for contacting Sutter Health Services on {!Employer_Group_Data__c.CreatedDate}.
At Sutter Health Services we strive to improve our services through customer feedback. We invite you to take a short survey to rate your experience.
Please click on the link below to access the online survey:
http://sutterhealth.force.com/SurveyForce/TakeSurvey?id=a0AG000000VHmo4MAD&cId={!Employer_Group_Data__c.HREnrollment_NameId__c}&caId={!Case.Id}&scnid={!Employer_Group_Data__c.Id}
Your survey will expire on {!Employer_Group_Data__c.SCN_Survey_Sent_Date__c} .
Thank you for your time.
Sincerely,
SHP Leadership Team
